events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on April 28th, causing moderate front-end damage.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after review of the initial report and incident description.
An agent was assigned promptly to the case to assist the customer with all upcoming procedures.
The claim was acknowledged via email, reassuring the customer their case is being processed swiftly.
The customer was asked to provide photos of the damaged vehicle along with the police accident report.
All requested documents including insurance papers and accident photos were submitted by the customer.
The claims investigation team has commenced assessing the submitted evidence and contacting involved parties.
The investigation concluded confirming the collision details and liability as per customer’s account.
A settlement amount was proposed covering the repair costs and rental car utilization during the vehicle downtime.
The customer responded with appreciation for the quick and clear settlement proposal and responsive communication.
The approval of the claim was confirmed, allowing the financial processing of the settlement to proceed immediately.
Payment for the repairs has been issued to the customer’s preferred bank account as part of the approved settlement.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that the vehicle was repaired and the customer was satisfied.
